source.content: France's interior minister says operation to detain Charlie Hebdo suspects is now underway northeast of Paris - @AP http://t.co/ZFJYh80uxy

comment.content: RT @BreakingNews: France's interior minister says operation to detain Charlie Hebdo suspects is now underway northeast of Paris - @AP
@BreakingNews @AP Lafayette here we come! Death to all who oppose democracy and freedom of expression!
@BreakingNews @Beltrew @AP Let's hope that these criminals cannot make more victims.
@BreakingNews @MaddowBlog @AP if there are hostages, hope and pray they get out safe #CharlieHebdo #JeSuisCharlie #JeSuisAhmed
